ThingDef.label: Primitive carpenter's table
ThingDef.description: The minimum set of tools for simple woodworking.

ThingDef.label: carpenter's table
ThingDef.description: A workbench containing a complete set of tools for working with wood.

ThingDef.label: primitive stonecutter's table
ThingDef.description: A simple workbench for working with stone. With it, you can process rock to obtain building material.

ThingDef.label: crucible
ThingDef.description: A large furnace that is hot enough to process primitive materials and create alloys.

ThingDef.label: Melting furnace
ThingDef.description: A large stone furnace that heats up to a temperature high enough to produce steel and other hard alloys.

ThingDef.label: Primitive forge
ThingDef.description: Forge is designed to processing ingots.

ThingDef.label: Forge with anvil
ThingDef.description: Workplace with a set of tools for metal processing. There is an anvil for more efficient work.

ThingDef.label: Cooking recipe table
ThingDef.description: A table with a set of accessories for keeping recipes. New food recipes can be created on this table.

ThingDef.label: cooking pot
ThingDef.description: Hinged boiler with which you can cook food.

ThingDef.label: Water plot
ThingDef.description: Specially fenced water area for planting plants that require a lot of water.

ThingDef.label: Alchemy stance
ThingDef.description: A table with many tools and bottles for the production of potions and chemicals.

ThingDef.label: Loom
ThingDef.description: A primitive machine for manually weaving fabrics from plant materials.

ThingDef.label: Cooking furnace
ThingDef.description: Large oven for baking. Great for creating delicious meals.

ThingDef.label: Manual flour mill
ThingDef.description: Workplace for manual flour grinding.

ThingDef.label: Windmill
ThingDef.description: A fairly simple mechanical design that uses wind to rotate millstones that are capable of grinding materials.

ThingDef.label: Watermill
ThingDef.description: Simple mechanical design for slow processing of raw materials. Installed on water and has a constant speed of operation, but very slow.

ThingDef.label: Primitive architectural table
ThingDef.description: A small table with a set of tools for drawing up primitive blueprints.

ThingDef.label: Advanced architectural table
ThingDef.description: A table with a set of tools for drawing up advanced blueprints.

ThingDef.label: Modern architectural table
ThingDef.description: A table with a set of tools for drawing up modern blueprints.

ThingDef.label: Mechanic table
ThingDef.description: Workplace for creating complex mechanical structures.

ThingDef.label: Simple repair table
ThingDef.description: Workplace for mending clothes and weapons.

ThingDef.label: Archeology table
ThingDef.description: Workplace for mending clothes and weapons.

ThingDef.label: Mining quarry
ThingDef.description: A quarry in which mining operations are carried out. A relatively simple and cheap design with which you can extract minerals at a depth of no more than 50 meters (the depth of each ore can be found out through its card).

ThingDef.label: Archeology place
ThingDef.description: A fenced-in excavation site that may lead to the discovery of valuable antiquities or relics.

ThingDef.label: Deep mine
ThingDef.description: A mining mine with the support of long and deep tunnels allows you to extract minerals that are deposited at great depths (up to 250 meters).

ThingDef.label: Ore washing machine
ThingDef.description: A simple mechanized ore washing plant.

ThingDef.label: Juicer
ThingDef.description: A primitive manual juicer for juicing fruits and berries.

ThingDef.label: Jewelry table
ThingDef.description: Workplace for processing precious stones and their subsequent use.

ThingDef.label: Blacksmith workshop
ThingDef.description: A workshop with tools and materials to create blueprints for modifying clothing and armor.

ThingDef.label: Compost pit
ThingDef.description: Pit for processing various organic items.

ThingDef.label: Large cook oven
ThingDef.description: An oven with a huge boiler for cooking on an industrial scale.

ThingDef.label: Arachnid hive
ThingDef.description: A large hive for producing jelly to provide a colony of arachnids.

ThingDef.label: Arachnid mutation hive
ThingDef.description: A hive within which arachnids can receive mutations with the help of uranium.

ThingDef.label: Processing arachnid hive
ThingDef.description: A biological arachnid hive that requires a worker to process the bodies of living organisms.

ThingDef.label: Arachnid brood cocoon
ThingDef.description:
A large biological reservoir for the brood of new arachnids. Can support the life of only one arachnid. The health of the embryo is affected by the ambient temperature, as well as the timely supply of yellorium and insect jelly.
The normal temperature range is 0~25 degrees. Lack of care will result in damage to the brood, which will affect the health of the newborn.

ThingDef.label: Fishing spot
ThingDef.description: Place on a water spot.

ThingDef.label: Primitive fishing trap
ThingDef.description: A small and simple trap that can help catch a small amount of fish.

ThingDef.label: Fishing trap
ThingDef.description: Trap with small stretched nets for more efficient fishing

ThingDef.label: Flowerbed
ThingDef.description: Box with soil for growing plants. Not very deep, and the growth rate leaves much to be desired.

ThingDef.label: Silk press
ThingDef.description: A mechanism for processing silkworms into the finest silk to create beautiful clothes and furniture.

ThingDef.label: sand smokehouse
ThingDef.description: A large stone oven covered with sand. In rooms with high temperatures, it can happen with an autonomous stove.

ThingDef.label: Manual concrete mixer
ThingDef.description: Manual concrete mixer for the production of concrete and mixing other materials. Not the most practical solution.

ThingDef.label: Mechanical workbench
ThingDef.description: A workbench that allows you to make more complex mechanisms. Despite the fact that it meets all modern requirements, all work is done manually and requires a lot of attention from the master, which slows down the overall speed of work.

ThingDef.label: Chemical station
ThingDef.description: Station for mixing and converting various liquids, ingredients to obtain various chemicals and substances.

ThingDef.label: Steam loom
ThingDef.description: Machine for the production of fabrics from vegetable raw materials, working on steam, which greatly increases the speed of work.

ThingDef.label: Steam forming machine
ThingDef.description: Steam-mechanical machine for efficient and fast turning of workpieces from wood and stone.

ThingDef.label: Steam crusher
ThingDef.description: The steam crusher crushes the ore to the state of ore powder. Additional processing allows you to get more resources when smelted.

ThingDef.label: Steam smelter
ThingDef.description: Industrial foundry for mass production.

ThingDef.label: Steam miner
ThingDef.description: Autonomous steam miner digging rocky soil on the surface of the planet.

ThingDef.label: Steam drill
ThingDef.description: The steam drill is designed for autonomous extraction of resources underground.

ThingDef.label: Seismic scanner
ThingDef.description: Seismic scanner for exploring deep ore deposits.

ThingDef.label: Steam mixer
ThingDef.description: The steam mixer is designed to mix various liquids and materials, for example to produce concrete.

ThingDef.label: Steam centrifuge
ThingDef.description: A mechanism used to process materials to find valuable resources.

ThingDef.label: Coke furnace
ThingDef.description: Stone furnace for making higher quality fuel.

ThingDef.label: Weapon workbench
ThingDef.description: Workplace for creating complex weapons.

ThingDef.label: Industrial crusher
ThingDef.description: A large electric machine for crushing ore into dust, which is later used for smelting.

ThingDef.label: Electrolysis bath
ThingDef.description: A small bath in which the electrolysis process is carried out to reduce metals.

ThingDef.label: Archeology drill
ThingDef.description: A robotic miner capable of excavating rocks without damaging fossil remains.

ThingDef.label: Electric teapot
ThingDef.description: A multifunctional device that can brew coffee and squeeze fruit juice.

ThingDef.label: Chemical composter
ThingDef.description: Electric machine for the production of liquid chemical fertilizers.

ThingDef.label: Repair table
ThingDef.description: Workplace for mending clothes and weapons.

ThingDef.label: Advanced repair table
ThingDef.description: Workplace for mending clothes and weapons.

ThingDef.label: Electric miner
ThingDef.description: Autonomous machine for mining rocks on the surface of the planet.

ThingDef.label: Advanced machining table
ThingDef.description: Electromechanical workbench for working on complex objects.

ThingDef.label: Arc smelter
ThingDef.description: An electric melting furnace that uses the thermal effect of an electric arc to melt metals and other materials.

ThingDef.label: Electric fertilizer
ThingDef.description: Autonomous device for applying fertilizers to the soil. Allows you to maintain the level of fertile layer for agricultural soils.

ThingDef.label: AutoChef
ThingDef.description: An autonomous device that prepares a specific dish. Can only cook general purpose meals.

ThingDef.label: Autofarm
ThingDef.description: Autonomous device for harvesting and planting crops. Place the desired seeds nearby.

ThingDef.label: Auto digger
ThingDef.description: A device for digging soil.

ThingDef.label: Steam blower
ThingDef.description: Device for converting saturated steam into ultra-high pressure steam.

ThingDef.label: Printing press
ThingDef.description: A machine for paper production.

ThingDef.label: Veterinary station
ThingDef.description: Machine for automatic feeding of animals with drugs.

ThingDef.label: Hydrogen sulfide collector
ThingDef.description: A device that collects hydrogen sulfide from geysers
